issue.title: Cloudsim simulation runs much longer than battery life if stop service is not called

content.raw: To answer the original question, we don't stop simulation after robot batteries run out because a robot could still be used as a communication node. You could, for example, position a robot such that it acts as relay node even if it cannot move.
